results.title: Top of the Lake
results.creator_credit: Screen Australia, See-Saw Films and Escapade Pictures
results.brief_description: A woman haunted by her past, Detective Robin Griffin, investigates complex and unsettling cases.

constellations_other.name: The drama and nuance of silhouette
constellations_other.description: Ali Gumillya Baker uses silhouette to evocative effect in her work reimagining the colonial gaze. The lighting technique has long been employed by filmmakers for its ability to dramatically convey a wide variety of emotions in everything from film noir to animation and whimsy.

constellations_other.name: Australians on the world stage
constellations_other.description: George Miller’s Mad Max revolutionised movies when it tore through cinemas in 1979. Max Rockatansky’s journey dispensing justice across the wasteland in his V8 Interceptor became a cult classic and catapulted Australian cinema onto the world stage.

constellations_other.name: Jan Chapman
constellations_other.description: From an independent Sydney cinema to the world's stage, Jan Chapman's work has many connections to the Australian film scene and Hollywood.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Screen Australia, See-Saw Films and Escapade Pictures
results.description: A woman haunted by her past, Detective Robin Griffin, investigates complex and unsettling cases.
description_for_label: A woman haunted by her past, Detective Robin Griffin, investigates complex and unsettling cases.

results.title: Top End Wedding
results.creator_credit: Joshua Tyler, Amy Baker, Heather Wallace, Miranda Tapsell, Screen Australia, Wayne Blair, Rosemary Blight, Kate Croser, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
results.brief_description: Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren’s mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.

constellations_other.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_other.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Joshua Tyler, Amy Baker, Heather Wallace, Miranda Tapsell, Screen Australia, Wayne Blair, Rosemary Blight, Kate Croser, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
results.description: Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren’s mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.
description_for_label: Lauren and Ned are engaged, they are in love, and they have just ten days to find Lauren’s mother who has gone AWOL somewhere in the remote far north of Australia, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.

video_links.name: Top End Wedding (2019) Official Trailer (Universal Pictures)

results.title: Tokyo Olympiad
results.creator_credit: Toho Co., Tokyo Olympic Film Association, Kon Ichikawa, Natto Wada, Yoshio Shirasaka, Shuntaro Tanikawa and Taguchi Suketaro
results.brief_description: This impressionistic portrait of the 1964 Tokyo Summer Olympics pays as much attention to the crowds and workers as it does to the actual competitive events. Highlights include an epic pole-vaulting match between West Germany and America, and the final marathon race through Tokyo’s streets.

constellations_other.name: No guts, no glory
constellations_other.description: TV arrived just in time for the 1956 Melbourne Olympics. The Olympics crystallise ideas of nationalism, athletic heroism, and controversy, all of which have been explored through countless features, documentaries and TV shows.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Toho Co., Tokyo Olympic Film Association, Kon Ichikawa, Natto Wada, Yoshio Shirasaka, Shuntaro Tanikawa and Taguchi Suketaro
results.description: This impressionistic portrait of the 1964 Tokyo Summer Olympics pays as much attention to the crowds and workers as it does to the actual competitive events. Highlights include an epic pole-vaulting match between West Germany and America, and the final marathon race through Tokyo’s streets. Two athletes are highlighted: Ethiopian marathon runner Abebe Bikila, who receives his second gold medal, and runner Ahamed Isa from Chad, representing a country younger than he is.
description_for_label: This impressionistic portrait of the 1964 Tokyo Summer Olympics pays as much attention to the crowds and workers as it does to the actual competitive events. Highlights include an epic pole-vaulting match between West Germany and America, and the final marathon race through Tokyo’s streets. Two athletes are highlighted: Ethiopian marathon runner Abebe Bikila, who receives his second gold medal, and runner Ahamed Isa from Chad, representing a country younger than he is.

results.title: Three Times
results.brief_description: There are three stories of women and men. In the first two stories, letters are crucial to the outcome; in the third, it’s cell-phone calls, text messages, and a computer file. Over the years between the tales, as sexual intimacy becomes more likely and words more free, communication recedes.

constellations_other.name: Place, portraiture, performance
constellations_other.description: The nature of the collaboration between David Gulpilil and Rolf De Heer on Ten Canoes connects the film to their other collaborations, and a number of other works as well.

results.description: There are three stories of women and men: in “A Time for Love” set in 1966, a soldier searches for a young woman he met one afternoon playing pool; “A Time for Freedom,” set in a bordello in 1911, revolves around a singer’s longing to escape her surroundings; in “A Time for Youth” set in 2005 Taipei, a triangle in which a singer has an affair with a photographer while her partner suffers is dramatized. In the first two stories, letters are crucial to the outcome; in the third, it’s cell-phone calls, text messages, and a computer file. Over the years between the tales, as sexual intimacy becomes more likely and words more free, communication recedes.
description_for_label: There are three stories of women and men: in “A Time for Love” set in 1966, a soldier searches for a young woman he met one afternoon playing pool; “A Time for Freedom,” set in a bordello in 1911, revolves around a singer’s longing to escape her surroundings; in “A Time for Youth” set in 2005 Taipei, a triangle in which a singer has an affair with a photographer while her partner suffers is dramatized. In the first two stories, letters are crucial to the outcome; in the third, it’s cell-phone calls, text messages, and a computer file. Over the years between the tales, as sexual intimacy becomes more likely and words more free, communication recedes.

results.title: Three Little Pigs
results.brief_description: The two pigs building houses of hay and sticks scoff at their brother, building the brick house. But when the wolf comes around and blows their houses down (after trickery like dressing as a foundling sheep fails), they run to their brother’s house. And throughout, they sing the classic song, “Who’s Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?”.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs, influence and inspiration
constellations_other.description: A tradition of influence and inspiration beginning with Eisenstein.

results.description: The two pigs building houses of hay and sticks scoff at their brother, building the brick house. But when the wolf comes around and blows their houses down (after trickery like dressing as a foundling sheep fails), they run to their brother’s house. And throughout, they sing the classic song, “Who’s Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf?”.

results.title: Thor: Ragnarok
results.brief_description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of a powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

results.description: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his home-world and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of a powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.

results.title: This Ain't California
results.creator_credit: Ronald Vietz, Michael Schöbel, Marten Persiel, Anne Zentgraf, Wildfremd Production, ARTE, MDR, RBB, Ira Wedel and Simone Eichhorn
results.brief_description: A retrospective look at the youth cultures born in the German Democratic Republic. A celebration of the lust for life, a contemporary trip into the world of skate, a tale on three heroes and their boards, from their childhood in the seventies, through their teenage rebellion in the eighties and the summer of 1989, when their life changed forever, to 2011.

constellations_other.name: Skate or die
constellations_other.description: Skateboarding is a subculture frequently documented, from amateur skate videos filmed with fish-eye lenses, to documentaries exploring the genesis of the subculture and gritty feature films depicting underlying social dynamics.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ronald Vietz, Michael Schöbel, Marten Persiel, Anne Zentgraf, Wildfremd Production, ARTE, MDR, RBB, Ira Wedel and Simone Eichhorn
results.description: A retrospective look at the youth cultures born in the German Democratic Republic. A celebration of the lust for life, a contemporary trip into the world of skate, a tale on three heroes and their boards, from their childhood in the seventies, through their teenage rebellion in the eighties and the summer of 1989, when their life changed forever, to 2011.
description_for_label: A retrospective look at the youth cultures born in the German Democratic Republic. A celebration of the lust for life, a contemporary trip into the world of skate, a tale on three heroes and their boards, from their childhood in the seventies, through their teenage rebellion in the eighties and the summer of 1989, when their life changed forever, to 2011.

results.title: Their Finest
results.creator_credit: Lone Scherfig, Stephen Woolley, Alice Normington, Amanda Posey, Finola Dwyer, Charlotte Walter, Gaby Chiappe, Elizabeth Karlsen, BBC Films, HanWay Films, Number 9 Films, Filmgate Films, Ripken Productions, Pinewood Pictures, Wildgaze Films and Film i Väst
results.brief_description: During the Blitz of World War II, a female screenwriter (Gemma Arterton) works on a film celebrating England’s resilience as a way to buoy a weary populace’s spirits. Her efforts to dramatise the true story of two sisters (Lily Knight and Francesca Knight) who undertook their own maritime mission to rescue wounded soldiers are met with mixed feelings by a dismissive all-male staff.

constellations_other.name: The war effort on film
constellations_other.description: Newsreel and documentaries were used as propaganda for the war effort by all sides during WWII, many of them made by major film studios, directors and actors.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Lone Scherfig, Stephen Woolley, Alice Normington, Amanda Posey, Finola Dwyer, Charlotte Walter, Gaby Chiappe, Elizabeth Karlsen, BBC Films, HanWay Films, Number 9 Films, Filmgate Films, Ripken Productions, Pinewood Pictures, Wildgaze Films and Film i Väst
results.description: During the Blitz of World War II, a female screenwriter (Gemma Arterton) works on a film celebrating England’s resilience as a way to buoy a weary populace’s spirits. Her efforts to dramatise the true story of two sisters (Lily Knight and Francesca Knight) who undertook their own maritime mission to rescue wounded soldiers are met with mixed feelings by a dismissive all-male staff.
description_for_label: During the Blitz of World War II, a female screenwriter (Gemma Arterton) works on a film celebrating England’s resilience as a way to buoy a weary populace’s spirits. Her efforts to dramatise the true story of two sisters (Lily Knight and Francesca Knight) who undertook their own maritime mission to rescue wounded soldiers are met with mixed feelings by a dismissive all-male staff.

video_links.name: Their Finest | Official Trailer | Own it Now on Digital HD, Blu-ray & DVD

results.title: The Wolf Man
results.brief_description: Ancient curses, fortune tellers and one of the most iconic movie monsters ever feature in Universal Pictures’ The Wolfman. After Larry Talbot (Lon Chaney Jr) returns home for his brother’s funeral, he’s bitten by a werewolf and transforms into a creature of the night.

constellations_other.name: Transformations
constellations_other.description: Like many techniques born from the visual language of magic lanterns, the dissolve effect was incorporated into filmmaking and is still used today.

results.description: After his brother’s death, Larry Talbot returns home to his father and the family estate. Events soon take a turn for the worse when Larry is bitten by a werewolf.
description_for_label: After his brother’s death, Larry Talbot returns home to his father and the family estate. Events soon take a turn for the worse when Larry is bitten by a werewolf.

results.title: The Windsors
results.brief_description: Comedy soap opera re-imagining the lives of the British Royal Family as you have never seen them before.

constellations_other.name: Royalty, royalty, royalty
constellations_other.description: Fascination with the royal family has persisted over the years, as seen through newsreels, documentaries, films, TV shows, tabloid news and satire.

results.description: Comedy soap opera re-imagining the lives of the British Royal Family as you have never seen them before.
description_for_label: Comedy soap opera re-imagining the lives of the British Royal Family as you have never seen them before.
